title: Building Capacity for Artificial Intelligence in Africa: A Cross-Country Survey of Challenges and Governance Pathways
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming education and the workforce, but access to AI learning opportunities in Africa remains uneven. With rapid demographic shifts and growing labour market pressures, AI has become a strategic development priority, making the demand for relevant skills more urgent.
